course.subject: HART
course.name: Introduction to Cantonese Opera
course.description:
This is an introductory course on Cantonese opera provided by the reputable Chinese Artists Association of Hong Kong (HK Bar Wo). One of the most representative components of cultural heritage in Hong Kong, Cantonese opera is a performing art with four performing techniques-- "singing", "reciting", "acting" and "martial arts performing" -- complemented by music accompaniment, costumes and abstract form of expression. By introducing the concepts, theories and aesthetic of Cantonese opera, students will be able to understand an important aspect of Hong Kong's local culture and appreciate its relation with Chinese traditional culture. Hands-on activities are also emphasized to help students experience stage aesthetic. Those interested in furthering the artistic skills and gaining more hands-on experience with this art form may enroll in the non-credit co-curricular workshops.
粵劇是一種揉合唱、做、唸、打、樂師配樂、戲台服飾、抽象形體等的表演藝術，乃香港本土最具代表性的表演藝術。「粵劇藝術概論」由香港八和會館設計課程，內容深入淺出，以粵劇表演藝術為經，香港本土文化為緯。由資深粵劇從業人員教授，理論、知識和實踐並重，讓同學加深認識中國文化，體驗舞台美學，提升文化素養。有意參與更多技巧練習的同學可報讀聯課工作坊。
